distribution_diagnostics.note: Highly skewed, zero-inflated, overdispersed - requires NB/hurdle

negative_binomial_regression.note: Correct model for skewed count/engagement data

neutral_valence.interpretation: Half the engagement of negative valence

key_findings_revised: INFORMATIONAL frame drives highest engagement (IRR=2.72, p<.001)
CONFLICT effect overstated by OLS; NB shows IRR=1.71, p=.10 (marginal)
Neutral valence penalized: IRR=0.51, p=.005 (half the engagement)
SOLIDARITY most common (32%) but not engagement driver
methodological_note: OLS inappropriate for skewed engagement data. Negative binomial regression preferred. Results differ substantively from naive OLS.
